title: Virginia Gentleman bourbon
content:
Hi, I'm trying to figure out the font used for Virginia Gentleman bourbon. I've used several type identifier websites and had no luck.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112506im_/http:/typophile.com/files/va_5085.png)

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112506/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: Lone Wolf

comments.content:
I see there are different forms of Virginia Gentlemen logo.  
Are you interested on this specific sample?

If you take for example the following sample, it looks close to **[New Century Schoolbook](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112506/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=URW&ffam=NewCenturySchlbkCnd-Bold%20-%20Regular&fid=32395491d7c6c2faf18c9e5fc0a318e1&fstyle=i&fsize=60&text=VIRGINIA%20GENTLEMEN&wrap=2)**:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112506im_/http:/typophile.com/files/virg-gent-bottle_5202.jpg)
That's the one fvilanakis, thank you.
